attributes.action: Give single, employed people with no children a break!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A single person with no dependents who works hard but gets an income of 15000 a year gets absolutely no help from Government.The only people in this country that don't. We have to pay the heightened taxes and rents too. What will you do about those people who work so hard just to find that their money dissappears in taxes and bills before they even see it. Its 2007 and there are people who work full time and still have to decide between food and travel to work.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Give single, employed people with no children a break!"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13796.asp

Prime Minister's Office
